completeListOfAbilities.name: Deprotect (XIII)
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Magic  PG attack
Target: 4 turns DEF Down III
Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV
Triggers additional  PF attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ for 8 turns after use

completeListOfAbilities.name: Deprotect (XIII)
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Magic  PG attack
Target: 5 turns DEF Down IIIã€? ATK Down II
Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV
Triggers additional  PF attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ for 8 turns after use

completeListOfAbilities.name: BRV Attack+
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Magic \bPG attack\nDeals extra damage to debuffed targets

completeListOfAbilities.name: Dispel (XIII)
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Magic  PG attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Removes 1 buff from target
Triggers additional  PF attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit
HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ for 12 turns after use

completeListOfAbilities.name: Dispel (XIII)
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Group magic  PG attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Grants party 80% of stolen BRV
Removes 3 buffs from all targets
Triggers additional  PF attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit
HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ for 12 turns after use

Target: 1 turn Assassination
